sections.purpose: To deliver fluids or drugs at controlled flow rates intravenously or intra-arterially.
sections.scope: Applicable to continuous drug administration studies.
procedure: Load the syringe or infusion set into the pump according to manufacturer instructions.
Prime the line to remove air bubbles.
Set the desired flow rate and total volume.
Connect the line to the animal's cannula.
Start the infusion and monitor for occlusion alarms.
At the end, stop the pump and disconnect the line.
Dispose of used tubing as biomedical waste.
precautions: Ensure all connections are secure to prevent leakage.
Avoid air bubbles to prevent embolism.
Use appropriate syringes and sets compatible with the pump.
